attributes.action: Create a road tax for visiting motor vehicles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For lorries, cars and motor bikes. As they do in Switzerland and Austria. It could last a few days or a whole year at a time. 
It would ease the stress on own own haulage industry and make a contribution to the upkeep of our roads.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
